post_content:
I have between $300-$500 to spend on vintage Cardinals' cards. I'm looking for low-grade (1-3 range) SGC or PSA graded cards that are centered with good registration. Here is my main want-list but I will look at anything. Pics can be sent via PM or to [url]cwazzy34@gmail.com[/url]. 

T206
Jap Barbeau
Roger Bresnahan (Batting)
Rube Geyer
Ed Konetchy (Glove Low)
Bill O’Hara (NY – Can’t afford the Cardinals version)
Ed Phelps
Al Shaw
Vic Willis (Batting)

T205
Roger Bresnahan (Mouth Open)
Louis Evans
Bob Harmon (Both Ears Showing)
Bob Harmon (Left Ear Showing)
Miller Huggins
Ed Konetchy
Rehel Oakes
Ed Phelps

T202
Bresnahan/Harmon (Caught Asleep Off First)
Bresnahan/McGraw (Just Before the Battle)
Hauser/Konetchy (The Athletic Infield)

1955 Topps Ken Boyer Rookie
1958 Topps Curt Flood Rookie
1965 Steve Carlton Rookie

Thanks in advance!
Chris
